trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started" /> and <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出工作流程執行階段引擎是否正在執行的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow runtime engine is running; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流程執行階段引擎正在執行則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs.IsStarted%2A> will be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and false for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs.IsStarted%2A> 事件的 `true` 為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件的則為 false。
